Parameters:
pfirst - Patient first name
plast - Patient last name
bday - Patient birthday
street - Patient street address
city - Patient city address
state - Patient state address
zip - Patient zip code
allowsLong - Flag for patients insurance (allows long fills)
dfirst - Doctor first name
dlast - Doctor last name
dFaxNum - Doctor fax number
demail - Doctor email
useFax - Doctor flag to use fax
useEmail - Doctor flag to use email
mlist - of patients medications
Method Detail

syncRefill

public org.joda.time.LocalDate syncRefill()
The method sync finds figures out the optimal date in which to sync medications depending on what flags the user has set It then tells the user how much of each medication is need to sync the medications

Returns:
The target date to sync to

syncCopay

public org.joda.time.LocalDate syncCopay()
Syncs to the of the medication with the highest copay

Returns:
Target date of the refill

syncCopayShort

public org.joda.time.LocalDate syncCopayShort()
Syncs to with the highest copay accounts for insurance limitations

Returns:
target date of the sync

highestCopay

public org.joda.time.LocalDate highestCopay()
Syncs to with the highest copay

Returns:
target date of the medication with highest copay
